name: Dart Shoot Fever - Hit Master
description:
This is a fun reaction game in which you can train your throw kinfe skill.
Your goal is so easy,throw your all darts to the spinning target,but avoid touching obstacles and other knifes.
Now start it!Keep a close eye on the spinning target,aim,wait for just the right moment to hit.Challenge all the levels and become the real knife master.

Enjoy!
